name: DevOps engineer
description:
We are looking for a DevOps engineer to enhance our team in IoT projects

Responsibilities:

  • Provide support on technical projects, as a subject matter expert in the fields of data communication protocol, data management, cloud data transfer, and cloud connectivity
  • Utilize in-depth knowledge of software engineering, cloud technologies, and data engineering, to define and target architectures, patterns, and processes that will help meet business needs

Requirements:

  • Cloud architecture experience on AWS, Azure, Google App Engine, PaaS, IaaS, SaaS products, and solutions.
  • Knowledge of managing and configuring IoT Cloud Services, including related support tools
  • 2+ years of hands-on software development, infrastructure engineering, solution architecture, or support of research software engineering
  • Experience with relational databases such as SQL, Cloud Technology, and IP Networking
  • Knowledge of the primary data streaming (Apache Kafka, Artemis), IT processes, DevOps, and CI/CD tools (e.g., Jenkins, Splunk, Ansible)
  • Understanding of Linux and other Linux flavored OS (CentOS, Ubuntu, etc.)
  • Systems management/administration automation in Python, Perl, Ruby, Bash, PowerShell, or related experience.
  • (optional) Programming experience in at least one language C#, .Net, Java, Javascript, Go, PowerShell, Node.js, Python, and Ruby
  • Ability to work with off-shore and distributed teams.

Nice to have:

  • Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science or Software Engineering 2+ years
  • Mastery of microservice patterns and hardware virtualization platforms
  • 2+ years systems engineering experience
  • 2+ years Linux experience
  • 2+ years systems automation experience

We offer:

  • Remote work or relocate in Innopolis
  • Competitive salary linked to the US dollar
  • Free English classes
  • Increased labor leave (30 calendar days), as well as 5 sick days.

Promwad is an electronics design center. Since 2004 we have been creating electronics and software for the consumer market, telecommunications, car electronics, automation, media, and entertainment.
